sentences.en: a game against their old rivals , Manchester United
sentences.cn: 和他们的老对手曼联队的比赛

sentences.en: a stadium to rival any in the world
sentences.cn: 世上一流的体育场

sentences.en: a vicious turf war between rival gangs of drug dealers
sentences.cn: 对立贩毒团伙之间的猛烈火并

sentences.en: He finished 39 seconds ahead of his main rival .
sentences.cn: 他比主要对手早39秒到达终点。

sentences.en: He had to endure the taunts of his successful rival.
sentences.cn: 他不得不忍受成功了的对手的讥笑.

sentences.en: He is a pastry chef without rival.
sentences.cn: 他是最好的面点师。

sentences.en: He is, in effect, my rival.
sentences.cn: 实际上他是我的竞争对手。

sentences.en: Many predict 1991 will rival the great vintage of 1965.
sentences.cn: 许多人预测1991年酿制的葡萄酒可以与1965年生产的佳酿相媲美。

sentences.en: Neither he nor his arch-rival, Giuseppe De Rita, won.
sentences.cn: 他和他的死对头朱塞佩·德里察双双落败。

sentences.en: Reiner, 56, has all but conceded the race to his rival.
sentences.cn: 56岁的赖纳在比赛中几乎已经向对手认输了。

sentences.en: Rival gunmen blew the city to bits.
sentences.cn: 敌人把这座城市炸成了一片废墟。

sentences.en: She defeat all her rival for the job with nonchalant ease.
sentences.cn: 她从容不迫地击败求职的所有竞争者.

sentences.en: She was 2 minutes faster than her nearest rival .
sentences.cn: 她比紧随其后的对手快两分钟。

sentences.en: She was edged out of the semi - final by her younger rival.
sentences.cn: 较年轻的对手取代了她的位置进入半决赛.

sentences.en: She was still gloating over her rival's disappointment.
sentences.cn: 她仍在为对手的失望而幸灾乐祸。

sentences.en: That would make the competition between rival suppliers even deadlier.
sentences.cn: 那将使得对立供应商之间的竞争更加你死我活。

sentences.en: The college’s facilities rival those of Harvard and Yale.
sentences.cn: 这所学院的设施比得上哈佛和耶鲁。

sentences.en: The industrial secrets were retailed to a rival concern.
sentences.cn: 工业秘密被泄露给一家对立的公司.

sentences.en: The voters bumped the senator and elected his rival.
sentences.cn: 选民们不选那位在职的参议员而选了他的对手.

sentences.en: Their sales have now overtaken those of their arch-rival (= main or strongest rival ) .
sentences.cn: 他们的销售额现已超过了主要竞争对手。

sentences.en: Their smaller rival is battling to end their duopoly.
sentences.cn: 规模更小的竞争对手正为结束他们的两强垄断局面而抗争着。

sentences.en: They still remain bitter rivals (= hate each other ) .
sentences.cn: 他们仍是死敌。

sentences.en: This gives the company a competitive advantage over its rivals.
sentences.cn: 这使该公司与其对手相比具有一项竞争优势。

sentences.en: We whomped our arch rival in the season's climactic football game.
sentences.cn: 我们在该季最精彩足球赛中打败了我们主要的对手.

trans.tran_en: a person, group, or organization that you compete with in sport, business, a fight etc
to be as good or important as someone or something else

trans.tran_cn: 与…竞争； 与…匹敌， 比得上
trans.tran_en: to be as good or important as someone or something else
